parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the position of original (loaded) center of object in model coordinates.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''boundingCenter''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [[PositionRelative]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_center <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''boundingCenter''' TruckOne</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[boundingBox]], [[sizeOf]], [[boundingBoxReal]]
</value></part></template>
